channel.title: Adding donater status
channel.description: Hey guys, im the coder of pvpscape, 508/525 (517) and i dnt no how to add donor status, (like theres a cool crown wen they talk) and stuff, i have donor arm for them... and but no real differences, like commands and stuff.. there are tuts on how to do this in 317 but not 508/525 and so plz help me, what i want to no: how to add donor status (crown) how to add special donor commands. plz and thank u

item.title: Adding donater status
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

Hey guys, im the coder of pvpscape, 508/525 (517) and i dnt no how to add donor status, (like theres a cool crown wen they talk) and stuff, i have donor arm for them… and but no real differences, like commands and stuff… there are tuts on how to do this in 317 but not 508/525 and so plz help me, what i want to no:
how to add donor status (crown)
how to add special donor commands. plz and thank u

Read full topic
